name: Hi Gay
description:
Do not be offended and shake your fist in anger. This game does not want to offend anyone and is made only for humor. Our hero is a guy with a non-traditional orientations. In the game he is in a harsh reality, but he does not lose heart. He brings all joy and happiness
The game awaits. RPG, Horor, arena, race which will be a lot of puzzles and tests. In RPG it is necessary to repaint graffiti and to change monuments without having caught sight of enemies, and enemies are very clever. Every enemy has its AI for example grandmothers can call for help and bears love to dance. Horor game will not let you relax as you will always need to walk only under the light. No noise. If you touch the subject you will immediately find. Unique bosses are waiting for you in the arenas and in the races the track will surprise you with its jumps, slides, traps and beautiful views.
  • Horror
  • Racing
  • Rpg
  • Puzzle game
  • and more...
